The idea isn't that we go 'hurr, TANK!', it's that we boost our defenses alongside our melee capabilities so as to not have to drop from combat, which is what we'll be doing if we go with dodge tanking, because we won't be able to take a hit.

The point of taking Technician, just the same, is only to further augment our offensive capabilities.
